reviews.text:
Ticket office is closed everytime I go through, no access for wheelchair / disabled people on one side,  no announcements for approaching trains that do not intend to stop or warning signs of passing trains causing air turbulence have seen an elderly couple not notice an approaching train due to no warning systems

Go to widnes instead

Fairly clean, one side has an indoor waiting area however generally smells of urine and isn't always open. Friendly staff, the staff are the onlything that brought this to be a 4 star, they're fantastic.
